text: Karrar Mohammed (born 6 March 1989 in Baghdad, Iraq) is an Iraqi footballer who last played as a Centre Back for Al-Zawraa in the Iraq Premier League, as well as the Iraq national team. ==International career== On 24 July 2016, Karrar made his first international cap with Iraq against Uzbekistan in a friendly match. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Al-Zawraa * Iraqi Premier League: 2015–16 *Iraq FA Cup: 2016–17 ;Al-Shorta * Iraqi Premier League: 2018–19 ==References== == External links == * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Basra Category:Association football defenders Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraq international footballers Category:Al-Bahri players Category:Naft Al-Janoob players Category:Najaf FC players Category:Al-Zawraa SC players Category:Al-Shorta SC players Category:Amanat Baghdad players‎
title: Karrar Mohammed
